name: "Queer as Folk" Season 3 Episode 1 Quiz | Television | 10 Questions

questions.text: What food does Ethan serve Justin for breakfast in bed?
questions.explanation:
Chocolate.

	Ethan gave Justin some chocolate pieces and a red rose.

questions.text: What food were Debbie and Michael preparing for dinner?
How many years were Melanie and Lindsay celebrating on their anniversary?
questions.explanation:
8.

	They were celebrating the 8th anniversary of their first date.

questions.text: Ben moved in with Michael because his apartment had been sublet.
questions.explanation:
True.

	Ben had sublet his apartment out to a lawyer for six months because of the trip that he was going to take to Tibet before he became ill.  He was unable to move back in his apartment so Michael offered to let him move in with him.

questions.text: What was the name of Vic's best friend that he had an intimate relationship with?
questions.explanation:
Carlos.

	Vic said that after he became intimate with his best friend things were never ever the same between them again.  That information got Ted and Emmett to wonder if it was worth risking their friendship for a relationship.

questions.text: Justin brought Ethan to the girls' anniversary party.
questions.explanation:
True.

	Melanie and Lindsay wanted Justin to share in their special day.  They told Justin not to worry because it would be the last place that Brian would be.  I guess they were wrong!

questions.text: What did Brian say to Justin while they were both in the bathroom together?
questions.correct: "I hope you get what you want"
options: "I hope that you catch a disease"
"You are just to young for me anyway"
questions.explanation:
"I hope you get what you want".

	It was their first contact together since Justin moved out of the apartment.  As Justin was leaving Brian told him that he hoped he was happy.

questions.text: Which eye did Brian punch Michael in?
questions.explanation:
Left.

	He punched him because he was talking badly about Justin.

questions.text: Who did the prostitute that Brian hired resemble?
questions.explanation:
Justin.

	Brian is obviously not over Justin if he paid someone that looked like him to have sex with him.  He had to pay the prostitute three hundred dollars.

questions.text: Do Emmett and Ted actually have sex in this episode?
questions.explanation:
yes.

	The main reason that they were having trouble is because they felt that once they crossed that threshold their friendship would never be the same.  But the episode leaves you feeling that they do consumate their love with each other.
